titleStmt.title: Rabshakeh vapulans, or, An answer to The tribe of Levi in vindication of the clergy : a poem, with a preface reflecting on the wit and civility of that famous poem, and some late pamphlets of the same nature.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by Randal Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: An answer to a satire attributed to John Tutchin.
One of a series of pamphlets concerned with William Sherlock; it also contains a few lines directed against Dryden.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
